content: ArbitrageScanner..io Istanbul 2023 | 9 November 2023 | Istanbul, TurkeyEvent Website: https://arbitragescanner.io/Web3-event-istanbulJoin the biggest cryptocurrency Web3 side event in Istanbul, 9 November! By ArbitrageScanner.io - the best tools for crypto analysis and crypto arbitrage.ArbitrageScanner Events is a private event for 200+ people, where the best of the crypto industry will gather, relax after Binance Blockchain Week and make new business connections, which each of the event attendees will be able to do. The event will be held at one of the best hookah establishments in Istanbul - Hookah Place. This establishment has a rating of 4.8/5 - come and enjoy delicious hookahs and pleasant atmosphere! It is at such events in a casual atmosphere that people find business partners, negotiate new deals and share the hottest ideas on the market. This was the case at our side event in Dubai on October 26th, where the leaders of the crypto industry shared their knowledge and further investment strategies.Don't miss the opportunity to interact with the strongest participants of the cryptocurrency and business industry, get new experiences and pleasant impressions.ArbitrageScanner clients have access not only to closed crypto events, but also to the tools of the service. ArbitrageScanner, Arbitrage Message and Arbitrage Wallet is the leading crypto project for blockchain analysis and according to customer feedback, it is the best service for cryptocurrency arbitrage between CEX and DEX exchanges.- ArbitrageScanner Events: https://arbitragescanner.io/Web3-event-istanbul- ArbitrageScanner Events Group: https://t.me/arbitragescanner_events - ArbitrageScanner Tools: https://arbitragescanner.io/
